name: Nothing In-Between
description:
Nothing In-Between is a small puzzle game where you can see the present and the future but nothing in-between. Push blocks and look into the future to solve puzzles.

Controls:

  • X: Rotate a Block
  • Arrow Keys: Move
  • Hold Shift + Arrow Keys: Pull neighboring block
  • Space: See the Future

Linux build currently untested...

Part of Open Jam 2019

Made with Godot 3.2

All images are released under CC by 4.0. Sound effects are released under CC0.

m6x11 font is owned by Daniel Linssen. Free to use with attribution.
